summary: Some Coinbase Wallet users are seeing empty balances amid an onboarding technical issue. The company said Monday that funds are secure.
title: Coinbase says it's investigating as some Wallet users see empty balances
content: Coinbase said Monday that it is investigating an error that had some Wallet users seeing zero balances.
"While we work on a fix, your funds remain secure," the company said in a status update.

"Customers of Coinbase Wallet may experience issues trying to sign in or onboard to CB Wallet," the company added. "Customers may also be seeing a display issue showing a 0 balance within some assets."
Some users took to social media to ask Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong about the issue, stating that their bitcoin balance wasn't showing.
The company said in a follow-up post that it had identified the cause of the issue that a fix was being implemented.
(Updates to show company identified cause of issue.)
